8 #ifndef IFACE_AUDIO_H_
9 #define IFACE_AUDIO_H_
10 
11 #include <codec2.h>
12 #include <hwpl/types.h>
13 #include <dev/fifo.h>
14 
15 #include "sc_phy.h"
16 
17 typedef struct {
18  struct CODEC2 * (*create)(int);
19  void (*destroy)(struct CODEC2 *);
20  void (*encode)(struct CODEC2 *, unsigned char *, short[]);
21  void (*decode)(struct CODEC2 *, short[], const unsigned char *);
22  void (*decode_ber)(struct CODEC2 *, short[], const unsigned char *, float);
23  int (*samples_per_frame)(struct CODEC2 *);
24  int (*bits_per_frame)(struct CODEC2 *);
25 } audio_codec_driver_t;
26 
27 #define I_AUDIO_SYS_INIT _IOCTL('A', 0)
28 #define I_AUDIO_SYS_CODEC2 _IOCTL('A', 1)
29 
30 #define I_MIC_FIFO_START _IOCTL('M', 0)
31 #define I_MIC_FIFO_STOP _IOCTL('M', 1)
32 
33 #define I_SPKR_FIFO_START _IOCTL('S', 0)
34 #define I_SPKR_FIFO_STOP _IOCTL('S', 1)
35 
36 #define AUDIO_LINK_PACKET_SIZE 64
37 #define AUDIO_LINK_START 0xF0F0
38 
39 enum {
40  AUDIO_LINK_CMD_NONE,
41  AUDIO_LINK_CMD_ENABLE_OUTPUT,
42  AUDIO_LINK_CMD_DISABLE_OUTPUT,
43  AUDIO_LINK_CMD_ENABLE_INPUT,
44  AUDIO_LINK_CMD_DISABLE_INPUT,
45  AUDIO_LINK_CMD_WRITE_ENCODED,
46  AUDIO_LINK_CMD_WRITE,
47  AUDIO_LINK_CMD_READ_ENCODED,
48  AUDIO_LINK_CMD_READ,
49  AUDIO_LINK_CMD_TOTAL
50 };
51 
52 #define AUDIO_LINK_HDR_SIZE (2)
53 #define AUDIO_LINK_DATA_SIZE (SC_DATA_SIZE-AUDIO_LINK_HDR_SIZE)
54 
55 typedef struct HWPL_PACK {
56  u8 cmd;
57  u8 size;
58  u8 data[AUDIO_LINK_DATA_SIZE];
59 } audio_link_pkt_t;
60 
61 typedef struct HWPL_PACK {
62  i16 status;
63  u8 data[AUDIO_LINK_DATA_SIZE];
64 } audio_link_reply_t;
65 
66 typedef int (*audio_callback_t)(void *, int, int);
67 
68 
69 typedef struct {
70  const char * path;
71  const sn_t * sn;
72  void * obj;
73  audio_callback_t progress;
74 } audio_request_t;
75 
76 enum {
77  AUDIO_REQUEST_RECORD_FILE_START,
78  AUDIO_REQUEST_RECORD_FILE_STOP,
79  AUDIO_REQUEST_SEND_RADIO_START,
80  AUDIO_REQUEST_SEND_RADIO_STOP,
81  AUDIO_REQUEST_PLAY_FILE,
82  AUDIO_REQUEST_TOTAL
83 };
